title: Optimal Strategy for Delivering Team Game Tactical Instructions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game theory knowledge and experience in team collaboration
context.additional_context: Learning information integration strategies applicable in the math domain, utilizing smartphone-based visual aids in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can select verbal, visual, or redundant instruction methods tailored to varying proficiency levels and deliver tactical instructions with 80% accuracy
Learners can explain three or more optimal instruction delivery methods based on cognitive load theory for situational contexts
Learners can demonstrate the process of integrating and executing tactical instructions effectively three or more times in team game scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
